title: patches in general
body: every time i update a new patch my client does not work for a game or 2 and i HAVE to lose a game and get penalized for 5 games can you please fix this problem i really feel like quitting league because of this

replies.body: Can you give me some more details on how the client *doesn't work*? With some more information, I can provide some steps to take in order to resolve this.
